mapper.insert: insert into crew_board_heart( heart_id, crewboard_num, user_id, heart_date ) values ( crew_board_heart_seq.nextval, #{crewboardNum}, #{userId}, sysdate )
mapper.delete: delete from crew_board_heart where user_id = #{userId} and crewboard_num = #{crewboardNum}
mapper.select: select board.crewboard_num, heart.user_id from crew_board_heart heart inner join crew_board board on board.crewboard_num = heart.crewboard_num and heart.USER_ID = #{getUserId}

select board.crewboard_num, board.crew_name, board.subject, board.writer, heart.heart_date, heart.user_id from crew_board_heart heart inner join crew_board board on board.crewboard_num = heart.crewboard_num and heart.USER_ID = #{getUserId} order by board.crewboard_num
